1112100689.title: minecraft:dyeable
1112100689.description: Dyeable item. You can set a default dye color for this dyeable item.

118156658.title: minecraft:tags
118156658.description: The tags component specifies which tags an item has on it.

tags.title: sequence container
tags.description: An array that can contain multiple item tags.

1569529519.title: minecraft:can_destroy_in_creative
1569529519.description: The can_destroy_in_creative component determines if the item can be used by a player to break blocks when in creative mode.

value.description: Determines whether the item can be used to destroy blocks while in creative mode.

1722502886.title: minecraft:weapon
1722502886.description: Weapon Item Component. Added to every weapon item such as axe, sword, trident, bow, crossbow.

on_hit_block.description: Trigger for letting you know when this item is used to hit a block

on_hurt_entity.description: Trigger for letting you know when this item is used to hurt another mob

on_not_hurt_entity.description: Trigger for letting you know when this item hit another actor, but didn't do damage

1752864692.title: minecraft:icon
1752864692.description: Icon item component determines which icon graphic will be used to represent the item in the UI and elsewhere.

texture.description: The key from the resource_pack/textures/item_texture.json 'texture_data' object associated with the texture file.

1762411589.title: minecraft:storage_weight_limit
1762411589.description: Controls the maximum weight a storage item can hold.

max_weight_limit.description: The maximum allowed weight of the sum of all contained items. Maximum is 64. Default is 64.

185503923.title: minecraft:block_placer
185503923.description: Items with the block_placer component will place a block when used.

block.description: Defines the block that will be placed.

use_on.title: sequence container
use_on.description: List of block descriptors of the blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

1876740853.title: minecraft:fuel
1876740853.description: Fuel item component allows this item to be used as fuel in a furnace to 'cook' other items.

duration.description: Amount of time, in seconds, this fuel will cook items.

1910227032.title: minecraft:display_name
1910227032.description: The display_name item component specifies the text shown whenever an item's name is displayed, like in hover text.

1944974468.title: minecraft:rarity
1944974468.description: Specifies the base rarity and subsequently color of the item name when the player hovers the cursor over the item.

value.title: enum Rarity
value.description: Sets the base rarity of the item. The rarity of an item automatically increases when enchanted, either to Rare when the base rarity is Common or Uncommon, or Epic when the base rarity is Rare.

1994334290.title: minecraft:should_despawn
1994334290.description: Should_despawn component determines if the item should eventually despawn while floating in the world

value.description: Determines whether the item should eventually despawn while floating in the world.

2012472025.title: minecraft:throwable
2012472025.description: Throwable items can be thrown by the player, such as a snowball.

do_swing_animation.description: Determines whether the item should use the swing animation when thrown. Default is set to false.

launch_power_scale.description: The scale at which the power of the throw increases. Default is set to 1.0.

max_draw_duration.description: The maximum duration to draw a throwable item. Default is set to 0.0.

max_launch_power.description: The maximum power to launch the throwable item. Default is set to 1.0.

min_draw_duration.description: The minimum duration to draw a throwable item. Default is set to 0.0.

scale_power_by_draw_duration.description: Whether or not the power of the throw increases with duration charged. Default is set to false.

on_dig.description: In format versions before 1.20.20, trigger for when you dig a block that matches this filter

speed.description: Digging speed for the correlating block(s).

2508699823.title: minecraft:interact_button
2508699823.description: This component is a boolean or string that determines if the interact button is shown in touch controls and what text is displayed on the button. When set as true, default "Use Item" text will be displayed.

2635679007.title: minecraft:glint
2635679007.description: The glint component determines whether the item has the enchanted glint render effect on it.

value.description: Determines whether the item has the glint effect.

2742722331.title: minecraft:digger
2742722331.description: Digger item component specifies how quickly this item can dig specific blocks.

destroy_speeds.title: sequence container
destroy_speeds.description: A list of blocks to dig with correlating speeds of digging.

on_dig.description: In format versions before 1.20.20, trigger for when you dig a block that isn't listed in destroy_speeds

use_efficiency.description: Determines whether this item should be impacted if the efficiency enchantment is applied to it.

2750804717.title: minecraft:food
2750804717.description: When an item has a food component, it becomes edible to the player.

can_always_eat.description: If true, you can always eat this item, even when not hungry. Default is set to false.

nutrition.description: Value that is added to the entity's nutrition when the item is used. Default is set to 0.

on_consume.description: Event trigger for when the item is consumed.

saturation_modifier.description: saturation_modifier is used in this formula: (nutrition * saturation_modifier * 2) when applying the saturation buff. Default is set to 0.6.

using_converts_to.description: When used, converts to the item specified by the string in this field. Default does not convert item.

2860933656.title: description v1.20.20
2860933656.description: Contains the required identifier for the item. May contain optional fields like menu_category.

identifier.description: Unique name for the item that must include a namespace and must not use the Minecraft namespace unless overriding a Vanilla item.

menu_category.description: menu_category contains the creative group name and category for this item.

2891802525.title: minecraft:shooter
2891802525.description: Shooter Item Component. Must have the 'minecraft:use_duration' component in order to function properly.

charge_on_draw.description: Charge on draw? Default is set to false.

max_draw_duration.description: Draw Duration. Default is set to 0.

scale_power_by_draw_duration.description: Scale power by draw duration? Default is set to false.

2896424358.title: minecraft:repairable
2896424358.description: The repairable item component specifies which items can be used to repair this item, along with how much durability is gained.

repair_items.title: sequence container
repair_items.description: List of repair item entries. Each entry needs to define a list of strings for `items` that can be used for the repair and an optional `repair_amount` for how much durability is gained.

2950913826.title: minecraft:liquid_clipped
2950913826.description: The liquid_clipped component determines whether the item interacts with liquid blocks on use.

value.description: Deterines whether the item interacts with liquid blocks on use.

items.title: sequence container
items.description: Items that may be used to repair an item.

repair_amount.description: How much the item is repaired.

298388283.title: minecraft:storage_weight_modifier
298388283.description: Controls the maximum weight a storage item can hold.

weight_in_storage_item.description: The weight of this item when inside another Storage Item. Default is 4. 0 means item is not allowed in another Storage Item.

300434879.title: minecraft:stacked_by_data
300434879.description: The stacked_by_data component determines whether the same items with different aux values can stack. Also defines whether the item entities can merge while floating in the world.

value.description: Determines whether the same item with different aux values can stack. Also defines whether the item entities can merge while floating in the world.

3045890075.title: menu_category v1.20.20
3045890075.description: menu_category contains the creative group name and category for this item.

category.title: enum CreativeItemCategory
category.description: Creative category where this item belongs. Defaults to "items".

group.description: The Creative Group that this item belongs to. Group name is limited to 256 characters.

is_hidden_in_commands.description: Determines whether or not this item can be used with commands. Commands can use items by default.

3103843467.title: minecraft:on_use
3103843467.description: The on_use item component allows you to receive an event when the item is used.

on_use.description: Event trigger for when the item is used.

3237868488.title: minecraft:durability
3237868488.description: The durability item component specifies how much damage the item takes before breaking, and allows the item to be combined to repair or augment them.

damage_chance.description: Specifies the percentage chance of this item losing durability. Default is set to 100. Defined as an int range with min and max value.

max_durability.description: Max durability is the amount of damage that this item can take before breaking. This is a required parameter and has a minimum of 0.

protection.description: How much protection the wearable item provides. Default is set to 0.

slot.title: enum SharedTypes::Legacy::EquipmentSlot
slot.description: Specifies where the item can be worn. If any non-hand slot is chosen, the max stack size is set to 1.

3400651845.title: minecraft:hand_equipped
3400651845.description: The hand_equipped component determines if an item is rendered like a tool while it is in a player's hand.

value.description: Determines whether the item is rendered like a tool while in the player's hand.

3446777064.title: minecraft:storage_item
3446777064.description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Storage Items can be used by other components to store other items within this item.

allow_nested_storage_items.description: Determines whether another Storage Item is allowed inside of this item. Default is true.

allowed_items.title: sequence container
allowed_items.description: List of items that are exclusively allowed in this Storage Item. If empty all items are allowed.

banned_items.title: sequence container
banned_items.description: List of items that are not allowed in this Storage Item.

max_slots.description: The maximum number of different item stacks. Maximum is 64. Default is 64.

3535671274.title: minecraft:cooldown
3535671274.description: After you use an item, all items specified with the same `cool down category` setting becomes unusable for the duration specified by the 'cool down time' setting in this component.

category.description: The type of cool down for this item. All items with a cool down component with the same category are put on cool down when one is used.

duration.description: The duration of time (in seconds) items with a matching category will spend cooling down before becoming usable again.

search_inventory.description: Can search inventory? Default is set to false.

use_in_creative.description: Can use in creative mode? Default is set to false.

use_offhand.description: Can use off-hand? Default is set to false.

3838845641.title: minecraft:entity_placer
3838845641.description: The entity_placer item component specifies the blocks that the item can be placed on.

dispense_on.title: sequence container
dispense_on.description: List of block descriptors of the blocks that this item can be dispensed on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

entity.description: The entity to be placed in the world.

use_on.title: sequence container
use_on.description: List of block descriptors of the blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

3846964237.title: minecraft:chargeable
3846964237.description: Event trigger for when the item has completed its use duration.

movement_modifier.description: Modifier value to scale the players movement speed when item is in use.

on_complete.description: Event trigger for when the item has completed its use duration.

389329139.title: minecraft:bundle_interaction
389329139.description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Adds bundle-specific interactions and tooltip to the item. Requires a "minecraft:storage_item" component.

num_viewable_slots.description: The maximum number of slots in the bundle viewable by the plater. Can be from 1 to 64. Default is 12.

3896768857.title: minecraft:hover_text_color
3896768857.description: The hover_text_color component specifies the color of the item name when the players hovers the cursor over the item.

value.description: Specifies the color of the item's hover text.

3954300834.title: minecraft:damage
3954300834.description: The damage component determines how much extra damage the item does on attack.

value.description: Specifies how much extra damage the item does, must be a positive number.

40622584.title: minecraft:enchantable
40622584.description: The enchantable component specifies what enchantments can be applied to the item. Not all enchantments will have an effect on all item components.

slot.description: Specifies which types of enchantments can be applied. For example, `bow` would allow this item to be enchanted as if it were a bow.

value.description: Specifies the value of the enchantment (minimum of 0).

4144080852.title: minecraft:projectile
4144080852.description: Projectile items shoot out, like an arrow.

minimum_critical_power.description: Specifies how long a player must charge a projectile for it to critically hit.

projectile_entity.description: Which entity is to be fired as a projectile.

minecraft:allow_off_hand.description: The allow_off_hand component determines whether the item can be placed in the off hand slot of the inventory.

minecraft:armor.description: The armor item component determines the amount of protection you have in your armor item.

minecraft:block_placer.description: Items with the block_placer component will place a block when used.

minecraft:bundle_interaction.description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Adds bundle-specific interactions and tooltip to the item. Requires a "minecraft:storage_item" component.

minecraft:can_destroy_in_creative.description: The can_destroy_in_creative component determines if the item can be used by a player to break blocks when in creative mode.

minecraft:chargeable.description: Event trigger for when the item has completed its use duration.

minecraft:compostable.description: Specifies that an item is compostable and provides the chance of creating a composting layer in the composter.

minecraft:cooldown.description: After you use an item, all items specified with the same `cool down category` setting becomes unusable for the duration specified by the 'cool down time' setting in this component.

minecraft:damage.description: The damage component determines how much extra damage the item does on attack.

minecraft:digger.description: Digger item component specifies how quickly this item can dig specific blocks.

minecraft:display_name.description: The display_name item component specifies the text shown whenever an item's name is displayed, like in hover text.

minecraft:durability.description: The durability item component specifies how much damage the item takes before breaking, and allows the item to be combined to repair or augment them.

minecraft:dyeable.description: Dyeable item. You can set a default dye color for this dyeable item.

minecraft:enchantable.description: The enchantable component specifies what enchantments can be applied to the item. Not all enchantments will have an effect on all item components.

minecraft:entity_placer.description: The entity_placer item component specifies the blocks that the item can be placed on.

minecraft:food.description: When an item has a food component, it becomes edible to the player.

minecraft:fuel.description: Fuel item component allows this item to be used as fuel in a furnace to 'cook' other items.

minecraft:glint.description: The glint component determines whether the item has the enchanted glint render effect on it.

minecraft:hand_equipped.description: The hand_equipped component determines if an item is rendered like a tool while it is in a player's hand.

minecraft:hover_text_color.description: The hover_text_color component specifies the color of the item name when the players hovers the cursor over the item.

minecraft:icon.description: Icon item component determines which icon graphic will be used to represent the item in the UI and elsewhere.

minecraft:interact_button.description: This component is a boolean or string that determines if the interact button is shown in touch controls and what text is displayed on the button. When set as true, default "Use Item" text will be displayed.

minecraft:liquid_clipped.description: The liquid_clipped component determines whether the item interacts with liquid blocks on use.

minecraft:max_stack_size.description: The max_stack_size component specifies how many of the item can be stacked together.

minecraft:on_use.description: The on_use item component allows you to receive an event when the item is used.

minecraft:on_use_on.description: The on_use_on item component allows you to receive an event when the item is used on a block in the world.

minecraft:projectile.description: Projectile items shoot out, like an arrow.

minecraft:rarity.description: Specifies the base rarity and subsequently color of the item name when the player hovers the cursor over the item.

minecraft:record.description: Record Item Component. Used by record items to play music.

minecraft:render_offsets.description: Render offsets component: optional values can be given to offset the way the item is rendered.

minecraft:repairable.description: The repairable item component specifies which items can be used to repair this item, along with how much durability is gained.

minecraft:shooter.description: Shooter Item Component. Must have the 'minecraft:use_duration' component in order to function properly.

minecraft:should_despawn.description: Should_despawn component determines if the item should eventually despawn while floating in the world

minecraft:stacked_by_data.description: The stacked_by_data component determines whether the same items with different aux values can stack. Also defines whether the item entities can merge while floating in the world.

minecraft:storage_item.description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Storage Items can be used by other components to store other items within this item.

minecraft:storage_weight_limit.description: Controls the maximum weight a storage item can hold.

minecraft:storage_weight_modifier.description: Controls the maximum weight a storage item can hold.

minecraft:tags.description: The tags component specifies which tags an item has on it.

minecraft:throwable.description: Throwable items can be thrown by the player, such as a snowball.

minecraft:use_animation.description: Use_animation specifies which animation is played when the player uses the item.

minecraft:use_duration.description: This component determines how long the item takes to use when used in combination with components like "shooter", "throwable", or "food".

minecraft:weapon.description: Weapon Item Component. Added to every weapon item such as axe, sword, trident, bow, crossbow.

424812726.title: minecraft:record
424812726.description: Record Item Component. Used by record items to play music.

comparator_signal.description: Specifies signal strength for comparator blocks to use, from 1 - 13.

duration.description: Specifies duration of sound event in seconds, float value.

sound_event.title: enum SharedTypes::Legacy::LevelSoundEvent
sound_event.description: Sound event type: 13, cat, blocks, chirp, far, mall, mellohi, stal, strad, ward, 11, wait, pigstep, otherside, 5, relic, creator, creator_music_box, precipice.

4283075804.title: minecraft:use_animation
4283075804.description: Use_animation specifies which animation is played when the player uses the item.

value.title: enum SharedTypes::Legacy::UseAnimation
value.description: Specifies which animation to play when the the item is used.

439611036.title: minecraft:max_stack_size
439611036.description: The max_stack_size component specifies how many of the item can be stacked together.

value.description: Specifies how many of the item that can be stacked.

441202.title: minecraft:use_duration
441202.description: This component determines how long the item takes to use when used in combination with components like "shooter", "throwable", or "food".

value.description: How long the item takes to use in seconds.

510448986.title: minecraft:compostable
510448986.description: Specifies that an item is compostable and provides the chance of creating a composting layer in the composter.

composting_chance.description: The chance of this item adding a new layer in the composter upon composting. Valid value range is 1 - 100 inclusive. Required field

543239976.title: minecraft:allow_off_hand
543239976.description: The allow_off_hand component determines whether the item can be placed in the off hand slot of the inventory.

value.description: Determines whether the item can be placed in the off hand slot.

574269635.title: minecraft:on_use_on
574269635.description: The on_use_on item component allows you to receive an event when the item is used on a block in the world.

on_use_on.description: Event trigger for when the item is used.

983689691.title: minecraft:render_offsets
983689691.description: Render offsets component: optional values can be given to offset the way the item is rendered.

999876734.title: minecraft:armor
999876734.description: The armor item component determines the amount of protection you have in your armor item.

title: minecraft:item v1.20.20
description: Item definition includes the "description" and "components" sections.

components.description: List of all components used in this item.

description.description: Contains the required identifier for the item. May contain optional fields like menu_category.
